response.original_title: The Summer I Turned Pretty: The Finale
response.overview: All roads lead to Paris in this epic, show-stopping series finale. Our summer girl Belly’s 22nd birthday takes an unexpected turn when someone from home crashes the celebration, and she must confront the life she thought she left behind.
response.tagline: Belly’s 22nd birthday takes an unexpected turn when she must confront the life she thought she left behind.
response.title: The Summer I Turned Pretty: The Finale
